derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: from early film serials in which episodes ended with characters in desperate situations such as hanging off the edge of a cliff

entry.tran: (局势、戏剧或电影的)悬念，最惊险刺激的部分
entry.def: A cliffhanger is a situation or part of a play or film that is very exciting or frightening because you are left for a long time not knowing what will happen next.

example.ex: The election is likely to be a cliff-hanger.
...cliffhanger endings to keep you in suspense.

means.word_mean: 1. a contest whose outcome is uncertain up to the very end
2. an episode that ends in suspense
